message.body: Hey Mike, I just moved back to philly. I'm sorry to hear your mom is in the ER. did you already get some soup? Id be happy to bring some over. And i cant drive you tonight but could tomorrow if you still need the ride
This is Gabi by the way
Hey man good to hear from you! I seem to be covered on both fronts, but thanks so much for your offer. Are you in Philly for good? Where you living?
Im living with Aaron in South Philly, im studying music ed at Uarts. I'd love to hang once you're feelin better
